note:
Mostly retired do-it-all web guy. I live in Pittsburgh and love the Black & Gold. Was at the Immaculate Reception game, selling peanuts.
I'm at 2:10 https://youtu.be/ce9WeMcfNW4
Please stop trying to make me care about everything. At my age my max is down to 6 things & dropping.. Cordial discussion is welcome, even if you're a Flyers or Ravens fan.
My wife, Nancy lives with MS so we're both #MSActivists
These days I'm just finding things that interest me to learn about.
